title: More trading pairs on Harmony blockchain
body:
The Harmony blockchain has seen huge growth since it first appeared on the Unifi Protocol and they have implemented many new features, attracted a number of new projects, and now have their own DeFi ecosystem that is undergoing rapid growth.

The trading pairs on Harmony have not reflected this growth. I propose that the following token pairs are added on the Harmony blockchain so that the Unifi Protocol can move with Harmony as it expands and develops.

USDT
contract address 0x3C2B8Be99c50593081EAA2A724F0B8285F5aba8f

WBTC
contract address 0x3095c7557bCb296ccc6e363DE01b760bA031F2d9

LINK
contract address 0x218532a12a389a4a92fC0C5Fb22901D1c19198aA

ETH
contract address 0x6983D1E6DEf3690C4d616b13597A09e6193EA013

There are also some additional tokens that I cannot vouch for the authenticity of, but, are listed on Harmony's official Telegram group and likely deserve to be explored.

I will add a short description to assist participants in drawing their conclusions.

LMA
contract address 0x7d0546dBb1Dca8108d99Aa389A8e9Ce0C40B2370
LMA is an NFT art gallery hosted on the Harmony blockchain. It is deflationary, with LFA being burned every time an NFT is purchased. https://lma-art-gallery.com/

VINCI
contract address 0x1548c6227cbd78e51eb0a679c1f329b9a5a99beb
VINCI is an NFT art gallery hosted on the Harmony blockchain. https://davinci.gallery/

FYLA
contract address 0x78f3092515647B8550Bd374c9894C2dB64829d34
FYLA is a tipping token and bot with Discord integration. It has an integrated function for tipping NFTs and aims to integrate Discord community roles that are manifested as NFTs. This would make admin positions and similar, tradable. https://freyala.com/info.
choices: The primary pairs should be added.
The primary pairs should be added, and the additional pairs should be reviewed by the team and added on a case-by-case basis.
Neither should be added at this time.
author: 0x987EbeD92EC52D83DF9da87844B7FCeb10dE484F
